```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)

fantasy <- read_csv("data/fantasy.csv")
```

```{r bpm_fpts}
ggplot(fantasy, aes(bpm, fpts_100)) +
  geom_point()
cor(fantasy$bpm, fantasy$fpts_100)
```

```{r per_fpts}
ggplot(fantasy, aes(per, fpts_100)) +
  geom_point()
cor(fantasy$per, fantasy$fpts_100)
```
